backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining user roles, schools, groups, profiles, tutoring sessions, access control, and profile management helpers with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing onboarding UI error-handling changes and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment variable template for configuring LLM API credentials and model settings.
frontend/.gitignore: Git ignore rules preventing local environment files containing secrets from being committed.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color variables and theme support for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/LLM_DEMO_SETUP.md: Instructions for configuring LLM API credentials and setting up AI demo features in the frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up theme, authentication provider, React Query client, and rendering AppShell.
frontend/src/app/AppShell.tsx: Authenticated shell handling login flow, profile setup, role-based routing, and page navigation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component showing attribution and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with role-based navigation, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login page UI using Internet Identity with a welcome message and login button.
frontend/src/features/auth/useGetCallerU: Hook fetching the current user's profile with proper loading control.
frontend/src/features/auth/useSaveCaller: Mutation hook to save or update the current user's profile and refresh cached data.
frontend/src/features/dashboards/parent/: Parent dashboard displaying linked students and selected student progress data.
Hooks fetching linked students, student progress, and weekly summaries for parents.
frontend/src/features/dashboards/student: Student dashboard showing weekly progress metrics and navigation to tutor or exam tools.
Hooks retrieving a student's recent activity and weekly progress summary.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/buil: Converts exam input fields into a deterministic user prompt string for the LLM. Formats board, grade, subject, syllabus scope, and exam specs into a structured prompt.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/Exam: Exam generator page allowing users to configure parameters and generate AI exam papers.
Simple wrapper exposing the Exam Generator page to the routing system.
Component rendering exam metadata and grouped questions with optional answer display.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/exam: Defines TypeScript types and validation guards for exam paper JSON schema. Ensures questions and metadata follow expected structure and constraints.
Provides the system prompt guiding the LLM to generate curriculumâ€‘aligned exam papers in strict JSON format. Specifies rules for question types, difficulty, marking, and quality.
Contains frontend-only exam generator types including Board enum and ExamRequest. Used to capture user context and syllabus scope when requesting exam generation.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/gene: Implements sample flow for generating an exam paper: validates config, builds prompts, calls the LLM API, and parses the response. Returns parsed paper or detailed errors.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/llmC: Loads and validates LLM API configuration from environment variables and builds request payloads. Ensures API key, model, headers, and request structure are correct.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/pars: Parses raw LLM output into JSON, strips code fences, validates schema, and checks mark totals. Provides structured success or detailed parsing errors.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/useG: React Query mutation hook wrapping exam generation. Calls generateExamPaperSample and manages loading, error, and success states.
frontend/src/features/language/indiaLang: Exports English plus 22 Eighth Schedule languages as selectable values. Provides a typed list used across UI components.
frontend/src/features/language/IndiaLang: UI component for selecting an Indian language using a dropdown populated from INDIA_LANGUAGES. Supports controlled value and placeholder.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/Onboard: Onboarding form for creating a user profile with validation and error handling. Collects name, email, role, and school, preventing unauthorized admin creation.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/profile: Maps backend profile-creation errors to user-friendly messages with specific handling for common cases.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/useCrea: React Query mutation to create a user profile via the backend and refresh the current profile cache.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/useGetS: Fetches a list of schools from the backend using React Query and the current actor.
frontend/src/features/tutor/buildTutorUs: Builds a structured user prompt for the AI tutor including student context, question, and optional language or attachment info.
frontend/src/features/tutor/generateTuto: Generates tutor responses by validating LLM config, building prompts, calling the LLM API, and returning formatted output.
frontend/src/features/tutor/TutorPage.ts: Main AI Tutor UI for submitting questions, uploading files, selecting language, and displaying generated responses.
frontend/src/features/tutor/tutorSystemP: Defines the system prompt establishing rules and style guidelines for AI tutor responses.
frontend/src/features/tutor/useRecordTut: React Query mutation to record tutoring sessions and refresh related progress queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state and login/logout helpers via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that queries are defined in feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables and typography rules for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash. Supports retrieving values with URL precedence and safe storage operations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and Inter fonts while enabling dark mode via class.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architecture notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the AI Tutor app. Used as the authoritative state snapshot for planning and development.
